Dec 16 (Reuters) - Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC): : *AMAZON'S PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF MGM NOT OPPOSED *ACQUISITION OF MGM BY AMAZON UNLIKELY TO SUBSTANTIALLY LESSEN COMPETITION IN ANY MARKET IN AUSTRALIA *Further company coverage: AMZN.O

  • ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;))
